200.description: Successful response - returns an object with a 'data' array of invoice objects

409.description: Conflict - error occurred while creating client

parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the client to delete
parameters.name: id

404.description: Client not found or invalid id

requestBody.description: Partial or full client object with fields to update

200.description: Successful update - returns the updated client object
Successful authentication. Returns the user, the user's profile, and a JWT token.

userProfile.description: Profile associated with the user (may be null if no profile exists).

token.description: JWT token string valid for 1 hour.

404.description: User not found for the given email.

parameters.description: User identifier used to find a profile (matches the userId field).
parameters.name: searchQuery

200.description: Successful response returning a profile matching the provided user id query

userId.description: Array of user id strings associated with this profile

data.description: Profile object (may be null if no profile found for the provided searchQuery)

404.description: Not found or error during lookup

200.description: Successful signup. Returns created user document, associated user profile (if any), and a JWT token.

userProfile.description: Profile associated with the user (may be null if no profile exists).

token.description: JWT token string valid for 1 hour.

400.description: Bad request. Occurs when the user already exists or when password and confirmPassword do not match.

message.example: User already exist or Password don't match

requestBody.description: Request payload containing the user's email for password reset

200.description: Password reset email process initiated successfully

422.description: User not found in the database

error.example: User does not exist in our database

requestBody.description: Payload containing the new password and the reset token

password.description: New password to set for the user

token.description: Reset token previously issued to the user

200.description: Successful response returning the profile object

404.description: Profile not found or an error occurred
Profile not found or invalid id.

parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the profile to update
parameters.name: id

requestBody.description: Profile object with fields to update

200.description: Profile updated successfully. Returns the updated profile document.

404.description: Invalid profile id (No client with that id).

parameters.description: Creator identifier used to filter invoices (mapped to InvoiceModel.creator).
parameters.name: searchQuery

200.description: Successful response. Returns the total number of invoices matching the searchQuery as a JSON number.

404.description: Error while fetching total count. Returns an object with an error message.

parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the invoice to retrieve
parameters.name: id

200.description: Successful response. Returns the Invoice object.

409.description: Conflict. Error while retrieving the invoice.

200.description: Successful operation. Returns an invoice object (for get or update) or a JSON message indicating deletion.

404.description: Not found. Returned when the provided id is not a valid invoice id.

parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the invoice to update
parameters.name: id

requestBody.description: Invoice object with fields to update (matches InvoiceModel schema)

200.description: Successful response - the updated invoice object

parameters.description: User id used to filter clients (matched against client.userId).
parameters.name: searchQuery

200.description: Successful response returning clients for the specified user

404.description: Error retrieving clients (not found or other error)
